bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Richard S. Emmet Aaron is a poetry bookstore owner in California whose nephew served in the Marines during the first Persian Gulf War.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Poems written in response to the war and collected by Aaron.
